  • Changelog

    New HIT Type

    new_hit_type.Rd

    New HIT Type

    Usage

    new_hit_type(
  title = "eviction-address-transcription",
  description = "Find and transcribe the DEFENDENT'S address from a court document pdf",
  reward = "0.15",
  duration = pyMTurkR::seconds(minutes = 10),
  keywords = "address, text, transcribe, entry, data",
  auto.approval.delay = pyMTurkR::seconds(days = 3),
  ...
)

    Arguments

    title

    The title for the HIT Type

    description

    A description to be shown to workers

    reward

    A string representing amount to be paid for successful completion in USD

    duration

    The time in seconds that a worker has to complete the assignment

    keywords

    A string with comma separated terms to be used to search for HITs of this type

    auto.approval.delay

    The time in seconds after which a completed assignment is auto-approved

    ...

    Additional arguments passed to pyMTurkR::CreateHITType()

    Value

    The HIT Type id

    Examples

    
if (FALSE) {
new_hit_type()
new_hit_type(reward = "0.20")
new_hit_type(duration = pyMTurkR::seconds(minutes = 20))
}
